text: The Jeep Renegade is a subcompact crossover SUV. It is built in Melfi, Italy on the same assembly line as the Fiat 500X, which it shares its platform with. The Renegade started production in 2014 as a 2015 model. It is the first Jeep model built only outside of North America. It is sold in South Africa, Europe, North America, and Brazil. In the US, the Renegade is available in the following trims: Sport, Latitude, Limited, and TrailHawk. All trims except TrailHawk are available with front and four-wheel-drive. The TrailHawk features four-wheel-drive as standard. The Renegade has two four-wheel drive systems: Active Drive I and Active Drive Low. Both are mated to Jeep's Selec- Terrain System. ==Engines== In the US, the Renegade comes powered by the following engines: * 1.4 L Inline-4 MultiAir Turbo with mated to a 6-speed manual transmission * 2.4 L Inline-4 Tigershark MultiAir2 with mated to a 9-speed automatic transmission ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Jeep Renegade Site * Latest Jeep Renegade Overview & Pictures Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2010s automobiles Category:Jeep vehicles
title: Jeep Renegade
